lines.text: I'm going to say a couple of words to you and I want you to say the first thing that comes into your mind.
That makes me think of a little girl in a pink dress sticking a hot dog through a doughnut.
We're going to Camp Crystal Lake.
Oh, yeah? Planning on smoking a little dope, having a little premarital sex and getting slaughtered?
Say, Doc! What's the verdict? Is Jason gonna be gettin' up and walkin' around any time soon?
He was nothing but a big old pussy anyway.

[to Jason's body]
Hey, fuck. How you doing, you fat-ass, maggoty, blown-up fuck?
Suck this. Suck it. You know what I'd like to do to you? I'd like to take a crap right on your fucking mask. A big old mango-sized crap.
Duke! The part about being reborn through a Voorhees woman, does it have to be a living woman?
Duke, that thing is in the basement with Jessica's dead mother!
Fuck that, I've got a gun.
Joey, please, just let me get the baby and we'll go.
Shut the fuck up! You're with a fucking felon!
[Jessica tries to grab the gun, causing it to misfire and hit the lights]
Now look what you fucking done!
[after witnessing Jason being blown up and the FBI thinking he's finally dead]
The only way to kill Jason Voorhees is to destroy his heart. And there's only one person who can do that now that Diana's dead. Her daughter.
And he will try to get to her before she can get to him.
Same thing he wanted her mother for.
You want information? You gotta pay.
Your hand. Are you ready to pay?

Those FBI idiots destroyed Jason's body, so now he needs a new one. The ones he's jumping in and out of, they can't last. They get diseased, he gets weak. Jason needs to be reborn again and he needs Jessica to do it.
Now, see, that is a very, very expensive question, boy. And I don't think you've got what it takes to pay the price.
I've gotta get out of here, gotta protect them.

The only way to do that is to kill Jason, and you can't, but Jessica can. Tell Jessica about her birthright. Make her believe you. Go to the Voorhees' house. Find proof. Because if you don't, Jason will kill her. And your baby.
this guy's deader than shit. Ha ha ha ha ha. Um, strike that last comment from the record.
I'll have a Voorhees burger and a side of Jason fingers.
That's my lady you're talking about.
Well, now, see, she is only your lady because she ain't had a taste of the Duke yet.

[talking on his cell phone]
You know what we're going for here. Twisted Secrets of the Voorhees House Revealed. Oh, and also one more thing. Guess what tomorrow's headline is gonna read. "Body of Slain Voorhees Woman Stolen From Morgue." Well, uh, last night, I stole Diana's body and I hid it here in the closet. And then I went hom and fucked her daughter. Reg. Reg, you wanna calm down? Listen, I'll talk Jessica into letting us shoot here, right? I'll bring the police, they'll discover the body on camera and our rating will go right through the fucking roof. How does that grab you?
Now, you think I killed Robert back there, right? There's no way he could've lived, right? I just ran the fucker over, right?
Just tell me, did I kill him or not?

Wrong. He is not dead and that is not Robert. Jess, I did not kill your mother. Yesterday, Josh, or someone that looked like Josh, killed her. After she blew off the back of his head. I stabbed him with a poker right through the heart, and the son of a bitch still lived.
Great shooting, Mahoney. Now clean up all that shit, huh?
So, uh, why are you going to the camp?
We're thinking about smoking some dope, having a little premarital sex and, uh, not worry about getting slaughtered.
It was Jason that killed Diana.
There's only one way to put an end to that devil and they don't know the way.
Information like that is very expensive.
I think you're too much of a coward to afford it.
Your hand. Give it to me. See, everything and everyone has a price. And the cost of this is very, very high. Are you ready to pay?
